game.beginning: In a post-apocalyptic world, humanity is on the brink of extinction due to a mysterious virus that turns people into violent, zombie-like creatures.
game.ending: The player's character, a skilled survivor, finally discovers the source of the virus and defeats its creator in an epic battle, saving what remains of humanity.
game.synopsis: After the outbreak, you're one of the few remaining survivors. You must navigate through the ruins of cities, scavenging for food and supplies while fighting off hordes of infected. Along the way, you'll meet other survivors who will aid or hinder your progress. As you delve deeper into the mystery behind the virus, you'll encounter unexpected allies and enemies, leading you to the truth about the outbreak's source.
game.title: Rebirth
